mapper.select: SELECT a.appr_status , a.appr_reason , a.sign_date , a.sequence , a.company_code , a.doc_no , e.employee_no , e.employee_name , e.rank_name , e.department_name , s.sign_img FROM approval a LEFT JOIN employees e ON a.employee_no = e.employee_no LEFT JOIN sign s ON a.appr_no = s.appr_no WHERE 1=1 AND a.doc_no = #{docNo} AND a.company_code = #{companyCode} ORDER BY sequence ASC
